title: Parameters for Simple Pure Pursuit Node

lookahead_gain.description: Gain for lookahead distance calculation: {lookahead distance} = lookahead_gain * {target velocity} + lookahead_min_distance

speed_proportional_gain.description: Gain for longitudinal acceleration calculation: {longitudinal acceleration} = speed_proportional_gain * ({target velocity} - {current velocity})

use_external_target_vel.description: Whether to use external target velocity
